message: Name calling, bullshit, and other such negative bias reactions will not be tolerated and shall be dealt with directly.
We will use this space to discuss topics that SHOULD NOT be discussed or SHOULD NO LONGER be discussed on twitter for the sake of the entire JS Community.
Remember that we are all people in here, act as if the person you are talking with is sitting right across from you... With an adult beverage in hand. Now discuss.
This is great. Thanks for setting this up, @voodootikigod!
